answers.answer: I'm 37w.. 50% effaced no dilation contractions here n there lots of stomach tightening... I've had false labor twice n my doctor says my son can come anytime but idk I feel like he's just gunna trick me the whole time n make me go over due...And I thought I lost my mucus plug at 33w but I think it probably grew back

My due date isnt till the 26, i havent lost mine.. im thinned out completely.. i dont know if im dialated.(ive had a weird pregnancy.. and they stopped checking me at 29 weeks and said if he came, he came.) But im being induced wednesday due to preeclampsia.. and im scared ill have to lay in it.
Noppee:( and idk if im even dilated or anything yet my doc hast checked me at all and im due on the 20
Due on the 27th I lost some yesterday and the rest today no dilation since the last time I was checked but I go back Thursday

I lost some last week, and more the other day. I'm sure there is more to lose tho, I'm getting checked for dialation tomorrow, I've had a lot of watery discharge so I'm hoping that's a sign of progress! 36+5
Last week ive been losing my mucus plug and yesterday i lost a big chunk the size of a golf ball but idk how dilated i am how do i find out?
I believe i have. Im due Aug 15 and have dilated 2 centimeters.  Good luck hun:)
I'm due on the 27 and I have not im a centimeter and a half dilated though.
Nope Not Yet & Im Due Next Week My Doctor Havent Check If Im Dilated Or Nothing

I'm due 25th, currebtly 37+1 weeks and I haven't lost mine yet and I'm not sure about how dilated because my midwife hasn't done any tests of that to me. Not sure how it works in nz. Any nz mums have had these checks with their midwife??

Im due the 20 so im about almost 38 weeks n haven't lost mine wondering the same thing if he guna make me wait til after the due date...I've been waiting for it to come out.lol n I haven't dilated yet either.. :(
Im due on the 14th, no I havent lost my mucus plug and no dialation. Ive been having lots of braxton hicks and some very very painful but nothing consistent yet.
I'm 38 weeks , 39 on Wednesday , I'm getting induced Wednesday due to health reasons . I've lost my mucus plug , and have had my bloody show . I'm already 3cm dilated .

I've lost a little. I find out tomorrow if I am dilated or effaced. I've also been having an increase of discharge. My boon also squirted today for the first time! My left nipple has been pushing out little to none colostrum and I pinched it before getting in the shower and there was a tiny squirt! I feel like I'm close.
5 days left and still haven't lost it yet not even dialated :(

Well now I don't feel so bad, Im a first time mummy and thought I should have lost my plug by now and be dilated so it puts my mind at rest knowing I'm not the only one lol.. Let's hope we all speed up the process soon and have some kind of sign that our babies are going to come out lol.. I'm getting so inpatient I just wanna meet my little girl!! :)

question: Have any August mummies lost there mucas plug yet? I haven't lost mine yet and at my 38 week appointment I wasn't dilated at all, my cervix is thin tho.. Doc thinks I may have bub early but I'm due in a week tomorrow and feel like she's gonna make me wait lol.. Who's feeling close?
title: August mums- mucas plug?
